name: DashBored
description: A twisted adventure of vulgarity and banter! Join Nicolas in his quest to break free from a dimension full of losers! Don't forget to bring your meds...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)/8/10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Its A ♥♥♥♥ing amazing game! The vulgarity, the world, the monsters, the characters and corruption. The music is fitting for the areas you go to! 10/10 ♥♥♥♥♥ES. Though I found A glitch (I Think) The bandit. I Cant talk to him. And I Cant get past him. Unless there is some other way then I dunno.
